A: 1. Prayer is a request to _ (a) God (b) Man (c) Devil
2. We pray to God to _ Him (a) Praise (b) Deny (c) Complain
3. Prayer means the words of _ (a) Praises (b) Insults (c) Association
4. We pray to God to beg _ of our sins (a) Forgiveness (b) Joy (c) Approval
5. When we pray, we must be _ (a) Humble (b) Proud (c) Crazy
6. We must pray _ (a) Always (b) Sometimes (c) Never
7. _ is our Father (a) God (b) Man (c) Devil
8. We should _ Him (a) Worship (b) Curse (c) Ignore
9. When we speak to God, we should _ Him (a) Respect (b) Disobey (c) Fear
10. When we pray, prayers are _ (a) Answered (b) Ignored (c) Delayed
11. The tax collector was _ (a) Humble (b) Proud (c) Ahead
12. The Pharisee was _ (a) Proud (b) Humble (c) Foolish
13. Tax collector's prayer was _ (a) Answered (b) Ignored (c) Delayed
14. Pharisee's prayer was _ (a) Ignored (b) Answered (c) Delayed
15. Prayer is communication between _ and man (a) God (b) Devil (c) Angels
16. When praying, we should _ our eyes (a) Close (b) Open (c) Squeeze
17. Our Father who art in _ (a) Heaven (b) Earth (c) Sea
18. We should _ even when tired (a) Pray (b) Curse (c) Snore
19. Some have food but cannot _ (a) Eat (b) Farm (c) Feed
20. We should honour _ (a) God (b) Man (c) Devil
